subject: [PATCH] btrfs: fix error messages in btrfs_check_features()

reviews.author: Qu Wenruo
reviews.summary: Reviewed the patch and found it to be correct. The error handling in btrfs_check_features() now behaves as expected, only printing unrecognized flags.

2026-02-18.patch_summary: This patch fixes a regression introduced by commit d7f67ac9, which caused btrfs_check_features() to print all unsupported incompat and compat_ro flags instead of just the unrecognized ones.

reviews.author: Qu Wenruo
reviews.summary: Approved the patch with a Reviewed-by tag, indicating that it meets the coding standards and is ready for inclusion in the kernel.

2026-02-19.patch_summary: The patch fixes a regression in btrfs_check_features() introduced by commit d7f67ac9, which caused it to print all unsupported flags instead of just the unrecognized ones.
